properties.address: All Saints Community Centre, 75 Church View Road, Camborne, Cornwall TR148RQ
properties.description: Open from We are open Monday to Friday all year except for bank holidays and two weeks around Christmas. Everyone is welcome We have a community larder, a cafe for hot food, a computer room, a sensory room for people needing relaxation or a quiet environment, community laundrette, advocacy support, benefit support, and much more besides
properties.title: All Saints Church Community Centre
